name: Brainpower (itch)
description:
(~5 Minutes)

A prototype I made to get a feel for every aspect of making a game, other than the tileset, everything was made from scratch.

This didn't end up being as fun as I thought it'd be. So unless something miraculous happens I probably wont be returning to this.

Click and drag the player brain, or other objects to fling them around.

Press 1-5 in the main menu if you wish to start at a later level

Press ESC at any time to return to the main menu

Press "R" to restart the current level
